data.actual_result: Only server icon disappears and mention section stays until you type something and them delete it in the quick switcher
data.expected_result: Server icon with mention and mention section both disappear
data.short_description: Channel mention doesn't go away in quick switcher when viewing mention on another platform
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up quick switcher on your iPhone - Receive a mention while having the quick switcher open - Clear the mention on another device - Observe the mention section on the quick switcher
